慰.definition: to comfort; to console; to reassure

慰勞.definition: to show appreciation (by kind words, small gifts etc); to comfort

慰問.definition: to express sympathy, greetings, consolation etc

慰安婦.definition: comfort woman (woman or girl forced into sex slavery by the Japanese military 1937-1945) (orthographic borrowing from Japanese 慰安婦 "ianfu")
